name: Jms Brrs
text: Prices could be better (always a problem with Pizza Hut), but I just had the best Pizza Hut pizza in over 20 years. I ordered a supreme and requested that they load it up; what I got was a picture-perfect supreme. Delicious!

name: Alton Smith Jr
text: I literally just placed an order online ($26.75). Gave the delivery guy $29.00 (A 20, 5, & 4 1's). Realized an item was missing. Called in and spoke with Dillon. Provided him with my name and address. Said he was looking up the order. Had …More

name: Lex
text: Great pizza. Staff is very helpful & polite.

name: Kevin Persaud
text: They have good deals from time to time. Dominos is way better though, lol

name: Renee Veber
text: Very disappointing!!!   Ordered pizzas a while back with extra sauce and cheese, didn’t have enough to cover it.  Manager gave me a $10 credit so thought we’d give them another chance.  This time still barely had any sauce, no extra cheese and both pizzas were severely burned (with a burnt taste).  Scratched them from our list.

name: kayla cantrell
text: There's a reason these people work here. I am so glad they work here and not as air traffic control, because people like that are the reason why we don't know if, in the ocean, that was a wing to some random plane or if it was flight 370. …More

name: Tajha Key
text: The pizza was delicious and just like I ordered it. The new fries the have is bomb! They got my order right even though it was a little difficult.

name: Rob Hill
text: Pizza hot has gone down Hill. Never again

name: Leslie Hall
text: Picked up in store..they allowed me to use a online only deal ..was ready quickly

name: Gregory Hall
text: I tried to place an order a couple hours ago and was told they were out of hand tossed crust! So then I said I would just order stuff crust. Guess what, no stuffed crust!!!! They said they only had thin crust. That is so rediculas. What …More

name: Michael Dunsmoor
text: Ordered online to get the deal. Seamless and a great pizza to boot!

name: Deanna Sims
text: for some reason the store manager decided we didn't need pizza and cancelled out our order. So we did not receive the pizza, breadsticks and cookie. we got nothing! Store manager was rude when we called to inquire about our order. So …More

name: James Erdmanczyk
text: Chloe Prince has a great manager.

name: Michelle Smith
text: Had to pick up my own delivery pizza after waiting for 3 hours...

name: J A
text: Absolutely terrible. Delivery order is late. I've tried to call the location 5 times. The first call someone picked up then hung up on me and then there was no answer the next 4 times. When my order finally arrived there is no marinara for the cheese sticks. Apparently the store needs better management. Completely unacceptable.

name: Death Stalker213
text: Terrible experience, I ordered my food at 10:21 pm and they told me it would be roughly 30 minutes and it's been well over an hour now and I call back to check on my order status and the store is closed and I still have not and will not get my food now.. will not be ordering from this Pizza Hut again.

name: Courtney Rogers
text: Took forever to finally get someone on the phone. Ordered the big dinner box, the pizza barely had any sauce on it, I ordered ham and pineapple and found ONION on my pizza which I HATE. The pizza sauce for the breadsticks  (only one) was …More

name: adam floyd
text: please read these reviews, they are all horrible for a reason. DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS PIZZA HUT YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED EVERY SINGLE TIME. This time our pizza was late and undercooked. Tried to fix it in our oven but it was still …More

name: antwan redding
text: I waited nearly two hours to get a pizza that wasn't even mines after Pizza Hut closed. They really think having credit for another pizza will make it better? I was starving for that pizza, and I want to talk to the general manager today!

name: Kendra Oates
text: Your food will be either burned or undercooked and don't even think about ordering delivery..... it took them almost1 hr and 45 min to deliver 2 orders of cheese sticks and garlic knots.

name: Briony P
text: Terrible customer service. Waited 20 mins just to have someone help me at the pick up counter. Worst service.

name: Dixie Hendley
text: Always have great service! Just made an order and they had my pizza to my house within 15 minutes of me ordering!

name: M B
text: Love their pizza.

name: John Nichols
text: 2.7 miles and is out of delivery zone why bother delivery save money on drivers just make every one pick up or eat in stop calling yourself delivery

name: Justin Dowd
text: Always order to go but it's always delicious and just the way I ordered it! No complaints!

name: James Durham
text: Garlic parmesan wings are life

name: Zach Robinson
text: They took my order but never delivered the did, then declined to return my money bc the system didn't show I made an order... Horrible service that will end in court.

text: Can't give review if they never delivered my pizza that I ordered!!!!  Ordered pizza at 10:11pm.  And it's now 12:21am.  Geez.  Glad I didn't give them my CC #

name: Randee Head
text: One of the pizzas was a Supreme instead of Honey BBQ.  Hard to see how that is confusing.  I won't be going there again.  I'll try another location.

name: antonio perrone
text: Getting someone on the ph was hell??? Always on hold forever.

name: Kevin K
text: It's Pizza Hut so don't expect the best pizza in town. Ordered delivery online and it said it would take an hour and it only took 30 minutes.
